member.name: T:SobekCM.Bib_Package.Tracking.Tracking_Info
member.summary: Class stores all of the tracking-specific data about a digital resource
member.remarks: This class is usually empty and is only populate if an internal user or a user who can edit this item looks at an the citation pages online.

member.name: M:SobekCM.Bib_Package.Tracking.Tracking_Info.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor for a new instance of the Tracking_Info class

member.name: M:SobekCM.Bib_Package.Tracking.Tracking_Info.Set_Tracking_Info(System.Data.DataSet)
member.summary: Method to read the tracking information dataset from the SobekCM database and set all the internal values in this object
member.param: DataSet with all the history, media, and archives information

member.name: P:SobekCM.Bib_Package.Tracking.Tracking_Info.Material_Rec_Date_Estimated
member.summary: Flag indicates that any material received date for the physical manifestation of this digital resource is an estimated date only
member.remarks: For memory space savings, this is saved in the first bit of a byte field (the first flags byte), along with other flags necessary for this object. Checking and setting this flag requires bitwise operations.

member.name: P:SobekCM.Bib_Package.Tracking.Tracking_Info.Born_Digital_Is_Null
member.summary: Flag indicates if this material is flagged as being born digital or if that value should currently be considered NULL.
member.remarks: For memory space savings, this is saved in the second bit of a byte field (the first flags byte), along with other flags necessary for this object. Checking and setting this flag requires bitwise operations.

member.name: P:SobekCM.Bib_Package.Tracking.Tracking_Info.Born_Digital
member.summary: Flag indicates this digital resource was born digital, and either never had a physical manifestation or is not derived from a physical manifestation.
member.remarks: For memory space savings, this is saved in the third bit of a byte field (the first flags byte), along with other flags necessary for this object. Checking and setting this flag requires bitwise operations.

member.name: P:SobekCM.Bib_Package.Tracking.Tracking_Info.Tracking_Info_Pulled
member.summary: Flag indicates if the tracking information ( history, media, and archives ) has been pulled for this item
member.remarks: For memory space savings, this is saved in the fourth bit of a byte field (the first flags byte), along with other flags necessary for this object. Checking and setting this flag requires bitwise operations.

member.name: P:SobekCM.Bib_Package.Tracking.Tracking_Info.Locally_Archived
member.summary: Flag indicates that some of the digital resource files for this item have been locally archived for safe-keeping.
member.remarks: For memory space savings, this is saved in the fifth bit of a byte field (the first flags byte), along with other flags necessary for this object. Checking and setting this flag requires bitwise operations.

member.name: P:SobekCM.Bib_Package.Tracking.Tracking_Info.Remotely_Archived
member.summary: Flag indicates that some of the digital resource files for this item have been remotely archived for safe-keeping.
member.remarks: For memory space savings, this is saved in the sixth bit of a byte field (the first flags byte), along with other flags necessary for this object. Checking and setting this flag requires bitwise operations.

member.name: P:SobekCM.Bib_Package.Tracking.Tracking_Info.hasArchiveInformation
member.summary: Flag indicates if this item has any archive information to display
member.remarks: For memory space savings, this is saved in the seventh bit of a byte field (the first flags byte), along with other flags necessary for this object. Checking and setting this flag requires bitwise operations.

member.name: P:SobekCM.Bib_Package.Tracking.Tracking_Info.Track_By_Month
member.summary: Flag indicates that this material is generally tracked by month
member.remarks:
For memory space savings, this is saved in the eighth bit of a byte field (the first flags byte), along with other flags necessary for this object. Checking and setting this flag requires bitwise operations.
This value is actually set at the item group (bibid) level

member.name: P:SobekCM.Bib_Package.Tracking.Tracking_Info.Large_Format
member.summary: Flag indicates if the item is considered large format, which will impact the size of the resulting derivative files
member.remarks:
For memory space savings, this is saved in the first bit of a byte field (the second flags byte), along with other flags necessary for this object. Checking and setting this flag requires bitwise operations.
This value is actually set at the item group (bibid) level

member.name: P:SobekCM.Bib_Package.Tracking.Tracking_Info.Never_Overlay_Record
member.summary: Flag indicates the originating record was significantly changed during import and the resulting METS files should never be overlayed from the source MARC file
member.remarks:
For memory space savings, this is saved in the second bit of a byte field (the second flags byte), along with other flags necessary for this object. Checking and setting this flag requires bitwise operations.
This value is actually set at the item group (bibid) level

member.name: P:SobekCM.Bib_Package.Tracking.Tracking_Info.Disposition_Advice
member.summary: Value advices how the physical material SHOULD BE disposed of after digitization
member.remarks: This points to a value held in a database table, or -1 if no advice is given

member.name: P:SobekCM.Bib_Package.Tracking.Tracking_Info.Disposition_Advice_Notes
member.summary: Notes regarding how this item should be disposed of (i.e., returned to whom, etc..)

member.name: P:SobekCM.Bib_Package.Tracking.Tracking_Info.Disposition_Type
member.summary: Value indicates how the physical material ACTUALLY WAS disposed of after digitization
member.remarks: This points to a value held in a database table, or -1 if no disposition type was given

member.name: P:SobekCM.Bib_Package.Tracking.Tracking_Info.Disposition_Notes
member.summary: Notes regarding how this item was disposed of (i.e., returned to whom, etc..)

member.name: P:SobekCM.Bib_Package.Tracking.Tracking_Info.Last_Milestone
member.summary: Value indicates which digitization milestone was last met.
member.remarks: The true values are derived from the dates for each milestone. This value is mostly used for quick report creation.

member.name: P:SobekCM.Bib_Package.Tracking.Tracking_Info.Internal_Comments
member.summary: Gets and sets the internal comments, which accompany this material but do not publicly show online

member.name: P:SobekCM.Bib_Package.Tracking.Tracking_Info.VID_Source
member.summary: Value which represents how this item was originally added to the database

member.name: P:SobekCM.Bib_Package.Tracking.Tracking_Info.Material_Received_Date
member.summary: Date the physical material was received in the office for digitizing

member.name: P:SobekCM.Bib_Package.Tracking.Tracking_Info.Material_Received_Notes
member.summary: Notes associated with the material receipt
member.remarks: This is just used to input notes about receipt while creating a new record. This is stored in the worklog and is not repopulated when an item is created.

member.name: P:SobekCM.Bib_Package.Tracking.Tracking_Info.Disposition_Date
member.summary: Date the physical material left the office after digitizing

member.name: P:SobekCM.Bib_Package.Tracking.Tracking_Info.Digital_Acquisition_Milestone
member.summary: First digitization milestone which represents when digital files were acquired from the physical original, or the date the born-digital file was uploaded or created

member.name: P:SobekCM.Bib_Package.Tracking.Tracking_Info.Image_Processing_Milestone
member.summary: Second digitization milestone which represents when digital files were post-acquisition proccessed, for everything from color balance, cropping to copyright blur.

member.name: P:SobekCM.Bib_Package.Tracking.Tracking_Info.Quality_Control_Milestone
member.summary: Third digitization milestone which represents when digital files had quality control performed

member.name: P:SobekCM.Bib_Package.Tracking.Tracking_Info.Online_Complete_Milestone
member.summary: Fourth digitization milestone which represents when digital files were marked as complete and made either public or IP restricted, depending on the intended audience.

member.name: P:SobekCM.Bib_Package.Tracking.Tracking_Info.Tracking_Box
member.summary: Indicates the current (or previous) tracking box in which this material was contained and generally stepped through the workflow milestones with

member.name: T:SobekCM.Bib_Package.EAD.Parent_Container_Info
member.summary: Class stores information about the containers which hold a component object from this EAD.
member.remarks:
This is an abstraction which replaced the strict box, folder, item structure. Those types of containers are still the most commonly encountered though.
This class contains information about a single level of the container hierarchy, and is generally used within a list of different types (i.e., one for the box information, one for the folder information, etc.. )

member.summary: SobekCM_Database is the main object used to query the database for information

This class contains a static constructor and contains mostly static members. Since this is a database class, it does not make sense to have multiple instances to access a single database.
Object created by Mark V Sullivan and Ying Tang (2006) for University of Florida's Digital Library Center.

member.name: T:SobekCM.Bib_Package.METS_Record_Status
member.summary: Enumeration of the different possible METS record status

member.name: F:SobekCM.Bib_Package.METS_Record_Status.BIB_LEVEL
member.summary: This record status indicated this is bibliographic-level METS file which is derived from SobekCM single item METS files.

member.name: F:SobekCM.Bib_Package.METS_Record_Status.COMPLETE
member.summary: This record status indicates the package is a complete package and instructs the SobekCM bulk loader to check for the existence of each file within the package.

member.name: F:SobekCM.Bib_Package.METS_Record_Status.DELETE
member.summary: This record status indicates this is a request to delete the pacakge

member.name: F:SobekCM.Bib_Package.METS_Record_Status.PARTIAL
member.summary: This record status indicates that this is a partial refresh of the digital resource in the SobekCM system. This instructs the SobekCM bulk loader to skip checking for existence of each file listed in the METS during validation.

member.name: F:SobekCM.Bib_Package.METS_Record_Status.METADATA_UPDATE
member.summary: This record status indicates this is a metadata update only, and should not be accompanied with any additional files if loaded through the SobekCM bulk loader.

member.name: F:SobekCM.Bib_Package.METS_Record_Status.OTHER
member.summary: Some other record status value is used here, unrecognized by the SobekCM system. The unrecognized status is retained in another field.

member.name: M:SobekCM.Bib_Package.Bib_Info.Coordinate_Polygon.Recalculate_Bounding_Box
member.summary: Forces a recalculation of the bounding box for this area and returns the new bounding box
member.returns: Rectangular bounding box, with the first point in the upper left corner and the second point in the lower right corner
